languages.text: "Войгтвир — предатель? Что же — в любой семье, сколь угодно благородной, найдется один-другой недостойный. Разумеется, мы выдадим его, если обнаружим в пределах моих владений. К сожалению, сведениями о его местоположении я не располагаю, но..." {n}Губернатор задумывается.{/n}

"Voigtvir is a traitor? Why, any family, however noble, has an unworthy scion or two. Naturally, we will surrender him should we find him within my jurisdiction. Unfortunately, I have no information regarding his location. However..." {n}The governor pauses to think.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Войгтвир — предатель? Что же — в любой семье, сколь угодно благородной, найдется один-другой недостойный. Разумеется, мы выдадим его, если обнаружим в пределах моих владений. К сожалению, сведениями о его местоположении я не располагаю, но..." {n}Губернатор задумывается.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Voigtvir is a traitor? Why, any family, however noble, has its unworthy scion or two. Naturally, we will hand him over if we find him within my jurisdiction. Unfortunately, I have no data as to his location. However..." {n}The governor pauses to think.{/n}

"Voigtvir is a traitor? Why, any family, however noble, has its unworthy scion or two. Naturally, we will hand him over if we find him within my jurisdiction. Unfortunately, I have no data as to his location. However..." {n}The governor pauses to think.{/n}

"Voigtvir is a traitor? Why, any family, however noble, has its unworthy scion or two. Naturally, we will surrender him should we find him within my jurisdiction. Unfortunately, I have no data regarding his location. However..." {n}The governor pauses to think.{/n}

"Voigtvir is a traitor? Why, any family, however noble, has its unworthy scion or two. Naturally, we will surrender him should we find him within my jurisdiction. Unfortunately, I have no data regarding his location. However..." {n}The governor pauses to think.{/n}

"Voigtvir is a traitor? Why, any family, however noble, has an unworthy scion or two. Naturally, we will surrender him should we find him within my jurisdiction. Unfortunately, I have no information regarding his location. However..." {n}The governor pauses to think.{/n}

"Voigtvir is a traitor? Why, any family, however noble, has an unworthy scion or two. Naturally, we will surrender him should we find him within my jurisdiction. Unfortunately, I have no information regarding his location. However..." {n}The governor pauses to think.{/n}

languages.text: "Voigtvir ist ein Verräter? Nun, jede Familie, mag sie auch noch so nobel sein, hat ein oder zwei unwürdige Sprösslinge. Wir liefern ihn natürlich aus, sollten wir ihn in meinem Herrschaftsbereich finden. Unglücklicherweise liegen mir keinerlei Daten über seinen Aufenthaltsort vor. Allerdings ..." {n}Der Gouverneur hält inne, um nachzudenken.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Voigtvir is a traitor? Why, any family, however noble, has an unworthy scion or two. Naturally, we will surrender him should we find him within my jurisdiction. Unfortunately, I have no information regarding his location. However..." {n}The governor pauses to think.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Voigtvir ist ein Verräter? Nun, jede Familie, mag sie auch noch so nobel sein, hat ein oder zwei unwürdige Sprösslinge. Wir liefern ihn natürlich aus, sollten wir ihn in meinem Herrschaftsbereich finden. Unglücklicherweise liegen mir keinerlei Daten über seinen Aufenthaltsort vor. Allerdings ..." {n}Der Gouverneur hält inne, um nachzudenken.{/n}

languages.text: « Voigtvir est un traître ? Eh bien, toute famille, aussi noble soit-elle, a un ou deux rejetons indignes. Naturellement, nous vous le remettrons si nous le trouvons dans ma juridiction. Malheureusement, je n'ai aucune information concernant l'endroit où il se trouve. Néanmoins... » {n}Le gouverneur marque une pause pour réfléchir.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Voigtvir is a traitor? Why, any family, however noble, has an unworthy scion or two. Naturally, we will surrender him should we find him within my jurisdiction. Unfortunately, I have no information regarding his location. However..." {n}The governor pauses to think.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Voigtvir est un traître ? Eh bien, toute famille, aussi noble soit-elle, a un ou deux rejetons indignes. Naturellement, nous vous le remettrons si nous le trouvons dans ma juridiction. Malheureusement, je n'ai aucune information concernant l'endroit où il se trouve. Néanmoins... {n}Le gouverneur marque une pause pour réfléchir.{/n}

languages.text: “维特威尔是个叛徒？唉，哪怕是再高贵的家族，也总会有一两个不肖子嗣。如果他出现在我的辖区里，我们一定会抓住他，把他带来。遗憾的是，我并不清楚他的下落，不过……”{n}总督停了下来，思考着。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Voigtvir is a traitor? Why, any family, however noble, has an unworthy scion or two. Naturally, we will surrender him should we find him within my jurisdiction. Unfortunately, I have no information regarding his location. However..." {n}The governor pauses to think.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “维特威尔是个叛徒？唉，哪怕是再高贵的家族，也总会有一两个不肖子嗣。如果他出现在我的辖区里，我们一定会抓住他，把他带来。遗憾的是，我并不清楚他的下落，不过……”{n}总督停了下来，思考着。{/n}

languages.text: 「ボイドヴィルが裏切り者？どんな高貴な一族にも、ひとりふたりは愚劣な子孫がいるものだな。当然、私の管轄内で彼を発見した場合は降伏させる。残念ながら、彼の居場所に関する情報はない。しかし…」{n}総督は、思考を巡らせて動きを止めた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Voigtvir is a traitor? Why, any family, however noble, has an unworthy scion or two. Naturally, we will surrender him should we find him within my jurisdiction. Unfortunately, I have no information regarding his location. However..." {n}The governor pauses to think.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「ボイドヴィルが裏切り者？どんな高貴な一族にも、ひとりふたりは愚劣な子孫がいるものだな。当然、私の管轄内で彼を発見した場合は降伏させる。残念ながら、彼の居場所に関するデータはない。しかし…」{n}総督は、思考を巡らせて動きを止めた。{/n}

languages.text: «¿Voigtvir, un traidor? Cualquier familia, por noble que sea, tiene uno o dos vástagos indignos. Evidentemente, lo entregaremos si lo encontramos dentro de mi jurisdicción. Por desgracia, no tengo información sobre su ubicación. Sin embargo...». {n}El gobernador hace una pausa para pensar.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Voigtvir is a traitor? Why, any family, however noble, has an unworthy scion or two. Naturally, we will surrender him should we find him within my jurisdiction. Unfortunately, I have no information regarding his location. However..." {n}The governor pauses to think.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¿Voigtvir es un traidor? Cualquier familia, por noble que sea, tiene uno o dos vástagos indignos. Evidentemente, lo entregaremos si lo encontramos dentro de mi jurisdicción. Por desgracia, no tengo datos sobre su ubicación. Sin embargo...» {n}El gobernador hace una pausa para pensar.{/n}

languages.text: "Voigtvir hain mi? Ne denli soylu olsalar da her aileden hayırsız evlatlar çıkabiliyor demek ki. Yetki sınırlarım içinde bulursak onu elbette size teslim ederiz. Ne yazık ki nerede olduğuna dair bir malumatım yok. Lakin..." {n}Vali, düşünmek için duraksıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Voigtvir is a traitor? Why, any family, however noble, has an unworthy scion or two. Naturally, we will surrender him should we find him within my jurisdiction. Unfortunately, I have no information regarding his location. However..." {n}The governor pauses to think.{/n}
